an4.274:4.1: “For insight into greed, four things should be developed.
an4.274:4.3: Firstly, a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
an4.274:4.4: They meditate by observing an aspect of feelings … mind … principles, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
an4.274:4.5: For insight into greed, these four things should be developed.”
